review: Patiently listens to all issues, symptoms, asks multiple questions too before concluding anything. Also thoroughly examines the baby without cutting corners. The prescription too is kept to minimal without recommending unnecessary meds. Overall had a very positive experience.
Doctor was friendly and suggested the right treatment that helped my son to recover fast.. If there is any doubt we can call him and ask..
